import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './User/CSS/User.css'; // Include the CSS from your original code import 'boxicons/css/boxicons.min.css'; const LoginSignup = () => { const [isAdmin, setIsAdmin] = useState(false); return (
{/* Login Form */}

Login {isAdmin ? 'as Admin' : 'as User'}

Forgot Password?
{/* Toggle Panels */}

Hello, Admin!

Switch to admin login?

Welcome Back!

Switch to user login?

); }; export default LoginSignup;
